description:
Purpose: To provision a MySQL RDS DB instance in AWS with disaster recovery configuration (i.e, Multi-AZ enabled).

Inputs Required: RDS DB - Name, Port, Username and Password, RDS Instance - Name, Instance Type, Storage and Multi AZ config.

Use case(s): Can be used to provision MySQL RDS DB instance on a schedule/demand with custom Storage and DB configuration
name: AWS_Provision_RDS_Disaster_Recovery_Configuration
